    TaskRouterTaskQueueCapability(String, String, String, String)

    Creates a new TaskRouterTaskQueueCapability token generator for Twilio TaskRouter.

    Declaration
    public TaskRouterTaskQueueCapability(string accountSid, string authToken, string workspaceSid, string taskQueueSid)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    System.String accountSid

    Your Twilio Account SID from your account dashboard
    System.String authToken

    Your Twilio Auth Token from your account dashboard. Used to sign capability tokens and will not be included in token contents.
    System.String workspaceSid

    The workspace to create a capability token for.
    System.String taskQueueSid

    The taskqueue to create a capability token for.
